TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PaperSize extends System.Object

span.span: Specifies the size of a piece of paper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別由和屬性來取得印表機可用的紙張大小，並分別設定頁面的紙張大小。This class is used by the and properties to get the paper sizes that are available on the printer and to set the paper size for a page, respectively. 您可以使用建構函式來指定自訂紙張大小。You can use the constructor to specify a custom paper size. 並屬性值可以設定只會針對自訂物件。The and property values can be set only for custom objects. 如需列印的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間概觀。For more information about printing, see the namespace overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會填入`comboPaperSize`印表機與 seznamem 支援的紙張大小。The following code example populates the `comboPaperSize` combo box with the printer's supported paper sizes. 此外，自訂紙張大小建立並加入至下拉式方塊。In addition, a custom paper size is created and added to the combo box. 識別為要透過加入項目會提供顯示字串的屬性下拉式方塊的屬性。The is identified as the property that will provide the display string for the item being added through the property of the combo box. 此範例假設名為變數`printDoc`存在和特定的下拉式方塊存在。The example assumes that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A使用這個建構函式建立一律會有其屬性設定為。A created with this constructor always has its property set to . 並屬性值可以設定只會針對自訂物件。The and property values can be set only for custom objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會填入`comboPaperSize`印表機與 seznamem 支援的紙張大小。The following code example populates the `comboPaperSize` combo box with the printer's supported paper sizes. 此外，自訂紙張大小建立並加入至下拉式方塊。In addition, a custom paper size is created and added to the combo box. 識別為要透過加入項目會提供顯示字串的屬性下拉式方塊的屬性。The is identified as the property that will provide the display string for the item being added through the property of the combo box. 此範例假設名為變數`printDoc`存在和特定的下拉式方塊存在。The example assumes that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此高度的度量單位是直向方向的紙張。This height measurement is for the portrait orientation of the paper. 並屬性值可以設定只會針對自訂物件。The and property values can be set only for custom objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的整數值列舉型別成員。The following table shows the integer values of the enumeration members. 值等於 48 或 49 或大於 118 表示自訂紙張大小;不過，屬性會傳回實際大小的整數值。A value equal to 48 or 49 or larger than 118 indicates a custom paper size; however, the property will return the actual integer value for the size. |整數Integer|紙張大小成員PaperSize member| |-------------|----------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| |66|| |77|| |88|| |99|| |1010|| |1111|| |1212|| |1313|| |1414|| |1515|| |1616|| |1717|| |1818|| |1919|| |2020|| |2121|| |2222|| |2323|| |2424|| |2525|| |2626|| |2727|| |2828|| |2929|| |3030|| |3131|| |3232|| |3333|| |3434|| |3535|| |3636|| |3737|| |3838|| |3939|| |4040|| |4141|| |4242|| |4343|| |4444|| |4545|| |4646|| |4747|| |5050|| |5151|| |5252|| |5353|| |5454|| |5555|| |5656|| |5757|| |5858|| |5959|| |6060|| |6161|| |6262|| |6363|| |6464|| |6565|| |6666|| |6767|| |6868|| |6969|| |7070|| |7171|| |7272|| |7373|| |7474|| |7575|| |7676|| |7777|| |7878|| |7979|| |8080|| |8181|| |8282|| |8383|| |8484|| |8585|| |8686|| |8787|| |8888|| |8989|| |9090|| |9191|| |9292|| |9393|| |9494|| |9595|| |9696|| |9797|| |9898|| |9999|| |100100|| |101101|| |102102|| |103103|| |104104|| |105105|| |106106|| |107107|| |108108|| |109109|| |110110|| |111111|| |112112|| |113113|| |114114|| |115115|| |116116|| |117117|| |118118|| |大於 118Greater than 118|自訂紙張大小A custom paper size|
